title: Vlancer
desc: A startup to introduce a Fiverr-like platform within Pakistan where people can put up advertisement for work they want to get done and the clients on the other end can easily connect and earn some money. (Web,iOS, Android).

section.title: Tailored For Pakistan
section.desc: The goal of this project was to introduce a user friendly platform for the Pakistani people. This platform has the potential of allowing people to earn some extra money above their daily money.

column.title: Messaging
column.desc: Utilizing the socket, a one-one chat was enabled to allow two parties to communicate which each other before they carry out a transaction

column.title: Wallet
column.desc: A personal wallet was created to allow people to store and easily out transactions. An overview was also given in the end

column.title: Live Notification
column.desc: A notification system was developed to quickly notify the people about it.

section.title: Vlancer For Android
section.desc: To maximize the outreach, we have made use of the flutter framework to try and target both android and ios users. At the moment, due to some limitations the IOS application has been delayed.
